Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Soaps
Status: Canceled/Ended
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: 10:00 pm
Runtime: 50 Minutes
Premiere: August 26, 2012

Bad Sugar centres on a dysfunctional, wealthy mining dynasty, with an ailing patriarch and some greedy siblings. It's a peculiarly British take on telenovela style melodramas, played for laughs. (Source: Channel 4) 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-30961)
